            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Start = $Security->get( $Start , 'integer' );
                        $Limit = $Security->get( $Limit , 'integer' );
                        
                        $Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        if( $Field === false )
                        {
                              $Results = $Database->select( 
                                    '*' , 'umx_error_log' , "1 = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $Start , $Limit"
                              );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $Field = $Security->get( $Field , 'command' );
                              $Order = $Security->get( $Order , 'command' );
                              $Order = $Order === 'ascending' ? 'ASC' : 'DESC';
                              $Results = $Database->select( 
                                    '*' , 'umx_error_log' , "1 = 1 ORDER BY $Field $Order LIMIT $Start , $Limit"
                              );
                        }
                        return( $Results );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
